the individual or the legal entity shall not induce suggest or force its employees whether full time or part time or its independent contractors in any methods to agree in oral or written form to directly or indirectly restrict weaken or relinquish his or her rights or remedies under such laws regulations rules and standards relating to labor and employment as mentioned above no matter whether such written or oral agreements are enforceable under the laws of the said jurisdiction nor shall such individual or the legal entity limit in any methods the rights of its employees or independent contractors from reporting or complaining to the copyright holder or relevant authorities monitoring the compliance of the license about its violations of the said license
